plans.title: Free
plans.description: Access basic features with limited functionality. Ideal for personal use and exploring the core capabilities of our service.

plans.title: Starter
plans.description: Ideal for small projects or individual use. Includes access to essential features, priority support, and 5GB of storage for your projects.

otherFeatures: Enable/disable any app at any time

plans.title: Pro
plans.description: Perfect for growing teams with more advanced needs. Offers additional features such as collaboration tools, 20GB of storage, and advanced analytics to track your progress.

otherFeatures: Enable/disable any app at any time

plans.title: Enterprise
plans.description: Advanced solutions for large-scale projects. Tailored for organizations requiring custom features, dedicated support, and unlimited storage capacity. Ideal for businesses looking to scale.

otherFeatures: Enable/disable any app at any time
